dataflow_demo.clients.data_api module¶

write_signal(date, df, sig_type, comment='')¶
write_stock_daily(date, df, comment='')¶
write_stock_tick(date, df)¶

Write stock tick df on date to data server.

Parameters

  • date (string) – date in %Y%m%d format, e.g. 20200418.

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – stock tick dataframe, columns are defined in Notes section.

Returns

Return type

None

Examples

>>> api = dataflow_demo.clients.data_api.DataAPI(data_host, data_port)
>>> api.authenticate(username, password, auth_host, auth_port)
>>> api.write_stock_tick(date, df)

Notes

tick dataframe format

index

Column Name

Description

Type

Example

Comment

1

datetime

日期

str

20190920

SSE(上海)/SZE(深圳)

2

code

股票代码

str

600000.SSE

3

lastprice

最新价格

double

10.22

4

bidprice

卖价

double

10.22

5

askprice

买价

double

10.22

6

volume

成交量

int

20
